content: the finished caterpillar is approximately 6 ½ long and the chrysalis is approximately 8 long when made with the recommended tools and materials **tools** * size g/4 25mm hook * tapestry/darning needle **materials** * worsted weight yarn caterpillar color chrysalis color * polyfil * safety eyes 12mm **pattern notes** * all parts of this pattern are worked with the size g/4 25mm hook unless otherwise stated * all parts of this pattern are worked using the yarn-over technique stitches are described using us terminology/notation
